title: Utilities for Various Japanese Corpora
text: ldccr utilities various Japanese corpora. goal ldccr package make easy use Japanese language resources. package provides: parsers several Japanese corpora free open licensed (non proprietary). downloader zipped text files published Aozora Bunko.

what: Download text file from Aozora Bunko
title: Utilities for Various Japanese Corpora
code: if (!dir.exists("cache")) dir.create("cache")  text <- ldccr::AozoraBunkoSnapshot %>%   dplyr::sample_n(1L) %>%   dplyr::pull("テキストファイルURL") %>%   ldccr::read_aozora(directory = "cache") %>%   readr::read_lines()  dplyr::glimpse(text) #>  chr [1:331] "フランダースの犬" "A Dog of Flanders" ...

title: Parse judges column of 'rte.*.tsv' — parse_jrte_judges
text: tbl tibble returned read_jrte name rte.*.tsv (function parse judges pn dataset).

text: tbl tibble returned read_jrte name rte.*.tsv.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

what: Download text file from Aozora Bunko — read_aozora
title: Download text file from Aozora Bunko — read_aozora
text: Download file specified URL, unzip convert UTF-8.

title: Download text file from Aozora Bunko — read_aozora
code: read_aozora(   url = "https://www.aozora.gr.jp/cards/000081/files/472_ruby_654.zip",   txtname = NULL,   directory = file.path(getwd(), "cache") )

title: Download text file from Aozora Bunko — read_aozora
text: url URL text download link. txtname New file name text saved. NULL provided, keeps name source file. directory Path new file saved.

title: Download text file from Aozora Bunko — read_aozora
JRTE Coprus Parser — read_jrte
text: Download read Japanese Realistic Textual Entailment Corpus. result function memoised memoise::memoise internally.

title: JRTE Coprus Parser — read_jrte
code: read_jrte(   url = "https://github.com/megagonlabs/jrte-corpus/archive/refs/heads/master.zip",   exdir = tempdir(),   keep = jrte_rte_files(),   keep_rhr = FALSE,   keep_pn = FALSE )

title: JRTE Coprus Parser — read_jrte
text: url String. exdir String. Path tempolarily unzip text files. keep List. File names parse keep returned value. keep_rhr Logical. true, function keeps rhr.tsv. keep_pn Logical. true, function keeps pn.tsv.

title: Livedoor News Corpus Parser — read_ldnws
text: Download read Livedoor News Corpus. result function memoised memoise::memoise internally.

title: Livedoor News Corpus Parser — read_ldnws
code: read_ldnws(   url = "https://www.rondhuit.com/download/ldcc-20140209.tar.gz",   exdir = tempdir(),   keep = ldnws_categories(),   collapse = "\n\n" )

title: Livedoor News Corpus Parser — read_ldnws
text: url String. exdir String. Path tempolarily untar text files. keep List. Categories parse keep data.frame. collapse String base::paste collapses lines.

title: Livedoor News Corpus Parser — read_ldnws
text: function downloads Livedoor News Corpus parses tibble. details Livedoor News Corpus, please see page.
